channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Agentic AI’s Token Paradox: When Cheaper Means More Expensive
item.description: AI is getting cheaper per token but more expensive in total as companies deploy autonomous agents that transform efficiency and enterprise value.

item.title: Warning As Google And Microsoft Calendar Hack Surge Confirmed
item.description: As a surge in malicious .ics invite attacks is reported, here’s what Google and Microsoft calendar users need to do immediately.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Tuesday, November 4 Clues And Answers (#877)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: 5 Reasons Behind The Rise Of ‘Reverse Age-Gap’ Relationships, By A Psychologist
item.description: The rise of the reverse age-gap is an indicator of how far we’ve come in reimagining relationships as spaces of growth rather than social contracts.

item.title: ‘Quordle’ Hints Today: Tuesday, November 4 Clues, Answers
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: Living in ghost cities
